I just didn't want to mode and was over causious.  Sorry about that.)


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Since when is it moding to pick up an unconscious bot? People do it 
> all the time, its not moding.
> 
> And Carnage, I apologize for the mode, there's no reason to go on 
and 
> on about it. I misread your post and figured Dino was unconscious.
> 
> ::Oblitertron/Prowl/Firearm::
> 
> Prowl runs over to Dinobot, his scanners reporting that the bot was 
> alive.
> 
> "Hey," he says, coming up to the Maximal warrior, "Can you walk? Or 
> do we need to carry you? The Alliance is mad, we need to get out of 
> here."
> 
> There was a rustle behind him as Firearm landed, his face full of 
awe 
> and surprise.
> 
> "What in the pit IS that thing?!" he exlaimed, motioning up at 
> Oblitertron.
> 
> "The Alliance gestalt," Prowl answers, still looking at Dinobot and 
> waiting for his answer.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Oblitertron roars, running at Necromancer and continuing to fire.
